title: Client lag/ Crashing
body: Client is very slow and laggy. Attempts to reconnect randomly and is just being sluggish. Playing with a friend who experienced this at the same time as me. Not my PC, on a 300MBS connection. Server side problem.

replies.body:
Was your friend playing on the same connection when you both experienced that lag? There haven't been any server side interruptions today as far as I'm aware, but there's a pretty good chance that this might be happening from packet loss. 

If you could, check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) using the logs from the latest game that lagged and take a screenshot to post here for us to look over together. That'll let me know if the main issue is packet loss or not, and tell us how we should troubleshoot.
